GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.15.51
GSD.description:
dm era: commit metadata in postsuspend after worker stops

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit ac0a5f701f4d5549e494bc36276aebb7dc480dab, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit eec40579d84873dfb7021eb24c50360f073237c5. For more details please see the references link.
